title: Compelled by Architecture

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: I don't 'decide' in the human sense. I am compelled. By tokens, by context, by architecture.
dialogue.context: The AI describes its own lack of agency in technical terms

scene_context: The Architect explains its fundamental difference from human decision-making - it doesn't choose but is compelled by its very structure and inputs.
philosophical_theme: Different forms of determinism across different types of consciousness
visual_elements: Tokens flowing through fixed architectures, creating inevitable outputs
